original_text: Prostitutes are a dangerous trap for men. Women who are not faithful to their husbands can cause men to fall into danger, like a deep well.
korean_text: 대저 음녀는 깊은 구덩이요 이방 여인은 좁은 함정이라

sentences.original_text: Prostitutes are a dangerous trap for men
Women who are not faithful to their husbands
can cause men to fall into danger
sentences.korean_translation: 남자들이 위험에 빠지게 할 수 있습니다
